```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(echarts)
```

## Example

Using dataset from [wordcloud2](https://github.com/Lchiffon/wordcloud2).

```{r load data}
library(wordcloud2)
data(demoFreq)
```

## Basic

[example](http://echarts.baidu.com/echarts2/doc/example/wordCloud.html#-en)

```{r}
demoFreq$colors <- colorRampPalette(rev(c("lightblue", "yellow", "orange", "red")))(nrow(demoFreq))

demoFreq %>% 
  echart(word) %>% 
  ecloud(freq, 
         colors,
         size = list("100%", "100%"), 
         textPadding = 0, 
         autoSize = list(enable = TRUE,
                         minSize = 5))
```
